When creating a new bug in bugzilla, if the repository attributes do not exist, the setupNewBugAttributes method fails.  This can be easily fixed by adding guards in the method to only get option values if some exist.

I have added guards in BugzillaRepositoryConnector.setupNewBugAttributes().  It turns out that guards were only needed for the priority and status as the other attributes already had this check.
